about_the_game:
This is a collection of in-game BGM soundtracks for "Masala Drive". (20 tracks in total)

1. Title call
2. Nain title, Bangalore
3. kolkata
4. Varanasi
5. Agra
6. New Delhi
7. Jaipur
8. Udaipur
9. Ellora
10. Mumbai
11. Cricket
12. Select
13. Help
14. Ranking
15. Staff roll
16. Stage clear
17. Game over
18. God!
Bonus Track
19. Stage X
20. Main title Another Ver.

Composed by Akiko Mori, Tomoaki Ooga
